title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-7.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 52-7.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Subpart, unless the context indicates otherwise, the following terms shall have the following meanings: (a) Eye donor means a human being, living or dead, who is the source of ocular tissue intended for transplantation. (b) Enucleation means the removal of the whole eye globe. (c) Corneal excision means the in situ or laboratory removal of the cornea or corneal-scleral rim. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
52-7.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
